mapper.select: SELECT M.*, LISTAGG(I.img_url, ',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY I.img_url) AS missing_img_urls FROM MissingBoard M LEFT JOIN image I ON M.missing_seq = I.missing_seq WHERE M.missing_seq = #{missingSeq} GROUP BY M.missing_seq, m.missing_name, m.missing_age, m.missing_sex, m.missing_outfit, m.missing_time, m.missing_point, m.user_seq
SELECT M.*, U.user_id, U.user_name FROM MissingBoard M JOIN tb_user U ON M.user_seq = U.user_seq WHERE M.missing_seq = #{missingSeq}
mapper.update: UPDATE MissingBoard SET missing_name = #{missingName}, missing_age = #{missingAge}, missing_sex = #{missingSex}, missing_outfit = #{missingOutfit}, missing_time = #{missingTime}, missing_point = #{missingPoint} WHERE missing_seq = #{missingSeq}
mapper.select: SELECT mb.missing_seq, mb.missing_name, mb.missing_age, mb.missing_sex, mb.missing_outfit, mb.missing_time, mb.missing_point, mb.user_seq, MAX(CASE WHEN i.img_order = 1 THEN i.img_url END) AS imgUrl1, MAX(CASE WHEN i.img_order = 2 THEN i.img_url END) AS imgUrl2, MAX(CASE WHEN i.img_order = 3 THEN i.img_url END) AS imgUrl3 FROM MissingBoard mb LEFT JOIN ( SELECT img_url, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY missing_seq ORDER BY img_seq) AS img_order, missing_seq FROM image ) i ON mb.missing_seq = i.missing_seq GROUP BY mb.missing_seq, mb.missing_name, mb.missing_age, mb.missing_sex, mb.missing_outfit, mb.missing_time, mb.missing_point, mb.user_seq

SELECT * FROM (SELECT m.MISSING_SEQ, m.MISSING_NAME, m.MISSING_SEX, m.MISSING_AGE, i.IMG_SEQ, i.IMG_URL AS IMG_URL1 FROM MISSINGBOARD m JOIN IMAGE i ON m.MISSING_SEQ = i.MISSING_SEQ WHERE m.MISSING_SEQ = (SELECT MISSING_SEQ FROM TB_CHATTING WHERE ROOM_SEQ = #{roomSeq}) ORDER BY i.IMG_SEQ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1

SELECT * FROM (SELECT m.MISSING_SEQ, m.MISSING_NAME, m.MISSING_SEX, m.MISSING_AGE, i.IMG_SEQ, i.IMG_URL AS IMG_URL1 FROM MISSINGBOARD m JOIN IMAGE i ON m.MISSING_SEQ = i.MISSING_SEQ WHERE m.MISSING_SEQ = #{missingSeq} ORDER BY i.IMG_SEQ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
